reviewText: This was a gringo speaking Spanish.  Not what I was expecting.

I saw this guy's videos on YouTube and figured I'd give it a try.  I bought the course online and went through the whole thing pretty quickly.  I've since been to Spain and it was actually really helpful!  The crazy part is, I used the same techniques in Italy and it worked really well too - I just had to look up the words that were different.  This course is exactly what they claim it is - I'm not fluent in Spanish, but I can get by now!
